definition:
A large and thick pancake, with slices of bacon in it. [Obs.] Johnson.

1. (Fort.)  A defense consisting of pointed stakes driven into the ramparts in a horizontal or inclined position. 2. (Mech.)  A fluted reamer for enlarging holes in stone; a small milling cutter.

To protect, as a line of troops, against an onset of cavalry, by opposing bayonets raised obliquely forward. Wilhelm.
